questions.question_text: Which are the actions that can be done in Test Explorer?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Test Explorer
Overview
Test Explorer is a panel that shows information relevant to test automation. You can use Test Explorer and its sub-panels to group tests together, perform debugging, or analyze activity coverage. https://docs.uipath.com/studio/standalone/2021.10/user-guide/test-explorer

Selected Answer: C
we cannot export test data and export test results, so it is C

choices.B: Export test data, group tests together, analyze activity coverage.
choices.D: Export test results, group tests together, analyze activity coverage.
choices.C: Perform debugging, analyze activity coverage, group tests together.
choices.A: Export test data, perform debugging, analyze activity coverage.

questions.question_text: In a UiPath development scenario, which type of process design would be the most appropriate for an automation task that executes actions in a straightforward progression without iteration or branching?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Same, dont think sequential is a type of process

Selected Answer: B
I don't think a sequential process is a type of process, like Linear, Iterative and Transactional are types of processes. Rather, a Sequential process is a linear process type.

Selected Answer: C
C is correct

questions.question_text: What specific combination of permissions is required to disable errors from the Error Feed widget on the Monitoring > Jobs page in UiPath Orchestrator Monitoring?

choices.A: Edit on Monitoring and Edit on Jobs.
choices.C: Edit on Monitoring and View on Jobs.
choices.D: View on Monitoring and Edit on Jobs.
choices.B: View On Monitoring and View on Jobs.

choices.D: Utilizing AI Computer Vision to train a custom machine learning model to recognize specific patterns in data.
choices.B: Applying AI Computer Vision to perform sentiment analysis on a provided text string and displaying the result.
choices.A: Employing AI Computer Vision to identify and interact with Ul elements in a remote desktop application with low quality or scaling issues.
choices.C: Using AI Computer Vision to extract plain text from a scanned PDF document and store the output in a string variable

questions.question_text: Which of the following examples accurately demonstrates the correct usage of AI Computer Vision features in a UiPath project?

A developer has designed a Performer process using the REFramework template in UiPath Studio. The process is published to an Orchestrator folder named "FolderA" and a job is created in Orchestrator from the package. The value of the OrchestratorQueueName setting in "Config.xlsx" is "QueueA" and the value of OrchestratorQueueFolder is ''FolderA”.

The developer runs the job from Orchestrator with the following argument values:

in_OrchestratorQueueName = “QueueB"
in_OrchestratorQueueFolder = empty value

Which queue will be consumed by the robot?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
In this case, the in_OrchestratorQueueName argument is set to QueueB and the in_OrchestratorQueueFolder argument is empty. This means that the robot will consume the queue named QueueB in the folder named FolderA .

C is the correct answer.
Explanation: If the folder argument is empty, it defaults to the folder where the job is running.
